reviewText: This DVD was defected when I tried to play it.

The movie is fine, and looks great, but the title of the item is misleading. This movie is mainly in Spanish, and most would not notice at first glance. I think it does mention that it is a Spanish release in the description, but it needs to made more clear for those in a hurry like myself buying Christmas presents. Luckily, you can still watch the movie in English, but you have to go through the setup in Spanish to do so. You also have to make sure you turn off the subtitles as well on whatever device you're watching it on.
Didn't play on my ps4 system.

This film has never looked better, the colors are bright, picture is amazing, even tho this disc lacks in special features and it is only the r rated cut of the film, it is still worth the every penny
